title: Automated Resume Customization using Agentic AI
features: Designed and deployed an agentic AI pipeline that automatically tailors resume content to target job descriptions, boosting ATS keyword match rates by 35% and reducing manual editing time by 70%.
Engineered end‑to‑end data ingestion and semantic matching modules using vector embeddings and prompt engineering, achieving sub‑second customization latency across 500+ resume templates.
Leveraged continuous learning from user feedback to refine resume scoring models, increasing candidate placement success by 22% in pilot studies.
